response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose an offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also the opportunity to secure it now at a premium rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
